summary: Accomplished senior manager with over 15 years of experience leading complex projects and managing resources to optimize enterprise technology and support business objectives. Committed to quality and service excellence with aptitude for launching new technology platforms. Subject matter expert in Information Security Risk Management. Excellent communicator adept at identifying business needs and bridging the gap between functional groups and technology to foster targeted and innovative solutions.

experience.title: Director of Information Technology and Analytics
experience.description: Directed the firm's worldwide information technology strategy; established policies and procedures and technology to mitigate corporate security risk and support Sarbanes-Oxley compliance; managed IT infrastructure including workstations, servers, IP telephony, L3 network infrastructure, network security, disaster recovery, Storage Area Networks and videoconferencing; led incident response planning; evaluated and deployed DLP and data governance initiatives; oversaw vendor relationships and talent development; oversaw IT deployments across global locations and contributed to business continuity planning.

experience.title: Information Technology Manager
experience.description: Directed hardware and software configuration, installation, troubleshooting, and support activities; oversaw network infrastructure administration, business systems, cabling and circuits, and telecommunications platforms; managed technology vendors/services and service metrics; led Windows 2003 migration, Cisco VPN, ERP project, disaster recovery, and staff supervision.

experience.title: Systems Administrator
experience.description: Administered and supported 250 client-node Windows NT environment; planned and implemented upgrade to Windows 2000; maintained DNS, WINS and DHCP in multi-site environment; managed 85-node development server environment; engineered and deployed SMS 2.0; designed imaging with Ghost; performed backups and monitoring.

experience.title: Data/Systems Administrator
experience.description: Global provider of IT products and services; oversaw daily data downloads from distributors and uploaded data to SQL databases; maintained and upgraded Windows FTP servers; performed hardware/software upgrades.
